TopicTitle: ship flips over when rotating to fast

Articles.Content:
**KSP Version:** 1.0.0 Windows On a 64-bit system 

**What Happens:** ship flips over when rotating to fast

**Mods / Add-Ons:** All Stock

**Steps to Replicate:**

1.) Fly up out of the atmosphere

2.) decouple ship

3.) rotate

**Result:** steering is very sensitive, when rotating faster and faster you get to a point where the ship start flipping directions. when rotating even faster you get slower.

**Other Notes/Pictures/Log Files:** 

- youtube video

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/jhs6xJ9AvHQ?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

- when going on EVA the Kerbal is shot away with enormous speed

imagelink: [http://i.imgur.com/kqMR9zt.png](http://i.imgur.com/kqMR9zt.png)

The ship flipping part looks like the [wagon wheel effect](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wagon-wheel_effect), and rapid spinning might also explain why the Kerbal is flung away so violently. There used to be a hard limit on rotation speed, but I'll have to see if that was changed in 1.0.
